title: My Youtube Channel NEW Nebula Time Lapes

replies.body:
Apparently I'm your first sub :) Hope to see more awesome videos!
Questions :
MIC = Whats a good cheap microphone im looking at this  : That looks pretty good, I use a $15 logitech headset from target (CAD ofc) so it would probably be cheaper if you would be in the US. Had mine for a year, still works even though I've been throwing it on the ground and punching it in rage of being bad over the year xD
RECORDING = Whats a good free or cheap Screen Recorder: I use bandicam, doesn't drop your frames, I recommend starting with the free version (you can record 10 min at a time and there is a watermark) but I got the full version which I adore ($40 for me)
EDITING = Got Vegas Pro 13: I use pinnacle studio 17, its owned by sony vegas :P so I saved around $200 :P
 
Edit: Nice intro! Looks awesome!

replies.body:
It would be easier to say if we like the video if we actually see one.

Just try making one and see how it goes; if the feedback is good, continue!
If not, you'll know people don't really like it.
